description: See detailed description of items in tender document
duration_in_months: This contract will be active for 1 month
full_summary:
### Audio Connectors Tender

**Reference:** cb-539-61694427
**Amendment:** 5
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-249228/A
**Notice Published:** January 17, 2024
**Bid Submission Deadline:** February 14, 2024, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

**Procurement Overview:**
The Department of National Defence (DND-DLP 7) requires a procurement of audio connectors for the Canadian Forces Support Establishment (CFSE) in Montreal, Canada. The required quantity is 300 units.

**Scope of Delivery:**
The delivery is requested at 25 CFSD Montreal on or before March 29, 2024.

**Specifications:**
* Part Number: VC-01-00012-1
* NCAGE: 35836
* Packaging: catalogue 20 bd Attenuator, NSN: 5935-21-921-6220
*Bidder must provide the brand name and model, and/or part number
* Equivalent or substitute product must provide the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) Commercial and Government Entity (NCAGE) code

**Procurement Details:**
* For convenience, bidders can download the solicitation documents from the Canadabuy website
* The Government of Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers
* This tender is subject to Article VII of the Canada-Germany Memorandum of Understanding (1970) and Article 2101 of the North Atlantic Treaty 
* Canadian goods and/or services are preferred
* All bids must be submitted in either English or French

**Contact Information:**
Joëlle Henri-Larocque
Phone: (819) 663-8653
Email: joelle.henri-larocque@forces.gc.ca
Selection criteria will be: lowest price among bidders
